name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D】みんなとの絆をチェックして、歌って重大告知を目指す！【#トワ様重大発表】 [t2j89jXBhO8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Transition and stage setup for the next song.

subtitles.original: ライメイ
subtitles.english: Raimei

subtitles.original: だって私いつまでも ずっと虜 君以外はもう有り得ない
subtitles.english: For I am forever captivated, there's no one else but you anymore

subtitles.original: ちょっといつもフラフラ どっち向くの 思わせぶり許さないからね
subtitles.english: You're always wandering, looking away, I won't forgive your suggestive behavior

subtitles.original: 好きだよって 強気になって 甘やかして もっと
subtitles.english: Say you love me, be bold, and spoil me more

subtitles.original: あのね 無理だよって 駆けるよって 触れたって 終わらせるから
subtitles.english: Listen, even if you say it's impossible, even if I run or touch you, I'll end it

subtitles.original: ガラスハート振り回して 骨の髄までしゃぶり尽くして
subtitles.english: Swing around your glass heart, suck it dry to the marrow

subtitles.original: 壊れるほど惑わせて You know, you know, you know
subtitles.english: Beguile me until I break, you know, you know, you know

subtitles.original: ダビデの星を転がして 時空を駆け巡って
subtitles.english: Roll the Star of David, travel through time and space

subtitles.original: 痺れる声は ライメイ
subtitles.english: That numbing voice is Raimei

subtitles.original: 勝手な妄想なんだけど こっち向いて 君以外はもう愛せない
subtitles.english: It's just a selfish delusion, but look this way, I can't love anyone but you anymore

subtitles.original: きっと気分屋なんだけど いつか私 焼きもちで狂いそうだから
subtitles.english: I'm sure you're moody, but I feel like I'll go crazy with jealousy someday

subtitles.original: 気づいちゃって 惹きつけたい ずっと
subtitles.english: Notice me, I want to keep drawing you in forever

subtitles.original: これは サンクコスト ただの愛情 なんでもいいけど
subtitles.english: This is a sunk cost, just affection, call it whatever you like

subtitles.original: 自分勝手で手なずけて 盗み顔で抱きおこして
subtitles.english: Tame me selfishly, pull me up with a sneaky face

subtitles.original: あざといぐらいの笑顔で You know, you know, you know
subtitles.english: With a smile that's almost too clever, you know, you know, you know

subtitles.original: その悪魔で不敵なのに ヤバい軌跡の見事な仕草
subtitles.english: Even though you're a fearless devil, those gestures follow a crazy trajectory

subtitles.original: 甘い 惑わすほどに 遠ざかる
subtitles.english: Sweet, as it beguiles, it drifts away

subtitles.original: 気分次第でもっと頂戴 幻だって That's alright
subtitles.english: Depending on the mood, give me more, even if it's an illusion, that's alright

subtitles.original: このまま 地獄へ さあ Jump together
subtitles.english: Just like this, to hell, let's jump together

subtitles.original: Lon lon lon lon lon...
subtitles.english: Lon lon lon lon lon...

subtitles.original: ガラスハート振り回して
subtitles.english: Swing around your glass heart

subtitles.original: 歌った今までの全部
subtitles.english: Everything I've sung so far

subtitles.original: あなた自身の心だって
subtitles.english: It's your own heart too

subtitles.original: You know, you know, you know ダビデの星を転がして
subtitles.english: You know, you know, you know, roll the Star of David

subtitles.original: 私だけを愛していて
subtitles.english: Love only me

subtitles.original: 壊滅的なほど 痺れる声は
subtitles.english: Devastatingly numbing, that voice is...

subtitles.original: ライメイ
subtitles.english: Raimei

subtitles.original: ミッドナイト・ランナウェイ
subtitles.english: Midnight Runaway

subtitles.original: 蒼い星に生まれて 違う道を歩いて
subtitles.english: Born on a blue star, walking different paths

subtitles.original: 辿り着いた この街 光る粒が弾けた
subtitles.english: I arrived in this city, where particles of light burst

subtitles.original: 巡るように君と出会い いつの間にか手を繋いで
subtitles.english: We met as if destined, and before I knew it, we were holding hands

subtitles.original: 笑い声と弾む足で どこまでも駆け抜ける Midnight
subtitles.english: With laughter and bouncing steps, we run anywhere through the midnight

subtitles.original: 見上げた空 星の光 街のネオンが混じり合って
subtitles.english: The starlight in the sky above blends with the city's neon

subtitles.original: 憂鬱な日々を忘れて 悪戯な苦い経験も全部捨て去って
subtitles.english: Forget the gloomy days, throw away all those mischievous, bitter experiences

subtitles.original: 僕らもっと自由なはず 閉ざした羽を開いたなら
subtitles.english: We should be more free; if we open our closed wings

subtitles.original: 退屈な日々にさよなら 夜の街を行こう さあ
subtitles.english: Goodbye to boring days, let's head into the night city, come on

subtitles.original: ビルを抜けて 街を追い越して
subtitles.english: Pass through the buildings, overtake the city

subtitles.original: さよなら蒼い星 なんておどけて
subtitles.english: Say "Goodbye, blue star" in jest

subtitles.original: どこまで行こう 変わらないものなんて
subtitles.english: Where shall we go? Since things that never change...

subtitles.original: 何もないから ただ一つだけ
subtitles.english: Don't exist at all, just one thing...
